transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji main Muradabad se bol raha tha na Raja Silverware se.
Customer: Ji?
Executive: Main Muradabad se bol raha hu Raja Silverware se.
Customer: Haan bataiye.
Executive: Awaaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Hamara aapke yaha account hai aapke yaha hamara. To hamare manager Mr. Himanshu ji the wo aapke yaha se chale gaye hain kya?
Customer: Ji sir abhi main aapko bhi naam find karke bataungi sir kya kya kaam aa rahi hai kya issue hai bata sakte hai aap?
Executive: Nahi nahi hamara hume pata chala hai ki jo hamare manager the hamare Himanshu ji wo aapke yaha jo hai wo IndiaMART chhod diye hain to hamara account manager hai unko unhone koi hume contact nahi kara isliye puchha aapko.
Customer: Ek second sir main dekh leti hu ek minute. Ek minute company ka naam bataenge sir aap?
Executive: Raja Silverware India wala Muradabad.
Customer: Ek second sir.
Customer: Sir Raja Silverware.
Executive: Ji mam.
Customer: Sir sir aapko call ki gayi hai.
Customer: Hello
Customer: Aapko sir main ek minute.
Customer: Ek second sir ek second.
Customer: Aapka sir ye basically jis number se aapke record ho rahi hai 98
Executive: 9837504676.
Customer: Theek hai sir main hi aapki account manager hu sir theek hai.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Achha theek hai aapka kya naam?
Customer: Sir mera naam Kritika Sharma bol rahi hu.
Executive: Theek hai ji theek hai. To aapke aapka contact number jo contact kaise baat hogi ispe hume kuch cheeze changes vagera karani hai sab karana hai to kaise hoga isme?
Customer: Haan ji to main bata deti hu aapko main na aapko apna contact number sari cheeze main aapko share karungi WhatsApp karungi aapka WhatsApp number aap mujhe bataenge ek baar?
Executive: 98375
Customer: Ek second sir.
Customer: 98375
Executive: 04676
Customer: Sir 9837504676 ye number hai na sir aapka?
Executive: Yes mam. Yes mam.
Customer: Main na sir ispe aapko call connect kar do minute mein theek hai sir main aapko call connect karungi.
Executive: Kyunki abhi humne baat kari thi to mera beta ko main number dunga aapka wo isme kuch changes hai wo dekh ke fir aapko bataenge to wo aapko hamara thoda isme aap kara dijiye.
Customer: Haan haan bilkul sir bilkul ye number jo hai sir jo aapne diya hai last 67 676 wale pe bhi baat ho jayegi na aapki 5 minute ke andar?
Executive: Haan main abhi koi dikkat nahi hai aap aaram se kar lijiye.
Customer: Theek hai sir main karti hu aapko. Thank you.
Executive: Theek hai mam okay mam thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Account manager has not contacted them.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed to be account manager.
- Executive will share contact details on WhatsApp.
- Will connect the call in 2 minutes.



Next Steps: 

- None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- account manager, contact details, changes
